openPositions.title: High School Mathematics Teacher
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics or related field
responsibilities: Teach mathematics to high school students (Grades 9-12)
Develop and implement lesson plans aligned with Alberta curriculum
Integrate Islamic values into mathematical concepts where appropriate
Assess student progress and provide constructive feedback
Participate in parent-teacher conferences and school events
Contribute to curriculum development and improvement
openPositions.description: We are seeking a passionate and qualified Mathematics Teacher to join our high school team. The ideal candidate will have strong mathematical knowledge, excellent teaching skills, and a commitment to Islamic education principles.

openPositions.title: Elementary Teacher (Grades 1-3)
requirements: Knowledge of Islamic studies and values
responsibilities: Teach core subjects to elementary students
Create engaging and age-appropriate lesson plans
Foster Islamic values and character development
Maintain classroom management and positive learning environment
Communicate regularly with parents about student progress
Participate in school activities and community events
openPositions.description: Join our elementary team as a dedicated teacher for Grades 1-3. We seek someone who loves working with young children and is passionate about integrating Islamic values with academic learning.

openPositions.title: Arabic Language Teacher
requirements: Experience teaching Arabic as a second language
responsibilities: Teach Arabic language to students of various levels
Develop Arabic language curriculum and materials
Conduct Arabic language assessments
Organize Arabic cultural events and activities
Support Quran recitation and memorization programs
Collaborate with Islamic Studies department
openPositions.description: We are looking for a qualified Arabic Language Teacher to strengthen our Arabic program. The successful candidate will help students develop proficiency in Arabic language skills while connecting them to their Islamic heritage.

openPositions.title: Administrative Assistant
requirements: High school diploma minimum, post-secondary preferred
Knowledge of Islamic community and values
responsibilities: Provide administrative support to school leadership
Manage student registration and enrollment processes
Handle phone calls, emails, and visitor inquiries
Maintain student and staff records
Assist with event planning and coordination
Support financial and HR administrative tasks
openPositions.description: Join our administrative team to support the daily operations of our Islamic school. We need someone who is organized, professional, and committed to our educational mission.

openPositions.title: Facilities Maintenance Coordinator
requirements: Physical ability to perform maintenance tasks
responsibilities: Perform routine maintenance of school facilities
Coordinate with contractors for major repairs
Ensure cleanliness and safety of all areas
Maintain prayer areas and ablution facilities
Manage inventory of maintenance supplies
Respond to emergency maintenance issues
openPositions.description: We are seeking a reliable Facilities Maintenance Coordinator to ensure our school environment remains safe, clean, and conducive to learning and worship.
